website_summaries.verdict: A well-made and affordable casket by a trusted company in a color for families that prefer a different look for saying goodbye to a loved one.
pros: Comes at the low price the company is known for, with the same quality and features – reliable customer care and shipping, nice design – in a vibrant green color with gold trim
cons: Color isn't for everyone, but is a nice pick for those who prefer something out of the ordinary

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this casket which was even more beautiful than I had imagined
customer_reviews.text: For my dad’s funeral, I ordered this casket which was even more beautiful than I had imagined. The casket was delivered earlier than expected. We are totally satisfied and thankful that we saved over $2600 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product and service!
customer_reviews.text: I was so pleased! It was simple, but BEAUTIFUL! I ordered this casket for my mother, who had cancer and she passed just a few days after ordering. I am so thankful to the AMAZING team of customer service personnel at Amazon who worked for two days to make sure the casket was delivered in time for my mom’s funeral. During such an overwhelming time of grief, you want to know that everything is taken care of- and it certainly was! I would recommend this product to anyone, every time!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Norris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased!! Our funeral home is charging more then double. Great price and delivered in 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: CustomerAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful casket
customer_reviews.text: When we ordered the casket my mom was in comfort care, the casket was 10 days from being delivered. She passed away 2 days after the order was placed.I contacted the freight company and they got me in touch with the driver. He went above and beyond and got the casket there 5 days early. I was very impressed with this. The casket was Beautiful. I'm not saying this happens all the time but I can't say enough good things about the process. Hats off to them at a difficult time in our family. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Tonyw

customer_reviews.title: I liked everything about this casket
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about this casket. It was beautiful!!! The customer service from the company where the casket was shipped from and Amazon customer service was excellent!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality product delivered quickly
customer_reviews.text: Titan Casket was timely and reliable. Excellent quality product delivered quickly. Thank you Titan Casket Company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing casket
customer_reviews.text: Extremely pleased with this casket. Gorgeous color, well made. Arrived earlier than quoted (received less than 48 hours after ordering and time was of the essence...) directly to the funeral home. They weren’t exactly thrilled that we bought from a different seller but legally had to allow it. Saved us $6,000 or more for the same model. Holy markup Batman! I say go for it. If a loved one is terminally ill, get this ordered or at least on your radar. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: holz0913

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Casket
customer_reviews.text: The casket turned out great for the funeral. It takes a while to ship, so make sure you purchase ahead of time.
customer_reviews.author: karl f.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, came faster than expected and price was just right!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Just what my wife wanted
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted a red casket, I wish she could have seen it.
customer_reviews.author: R Mcgill

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Se were so pleased with the casket, it was beautiful, was delivered to funeral home early, we were all very pleased. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Under very sad circumstances this casket was bought. Since I purchased it for the family I first saw it at the service. I could not believe the quality of this casket, it was beautiful and very well made. The delivery and the customer service were amazing it was actually delivered before the scheduled time. Thank you Amazon and Ceva for providing such a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Lou C

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Service!
customer_reviews.text: The casket was beautifully packed, looked gorgeous and the customer service is TOP NOTCH!
customer_reviews.author: Marilin Polanco

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: We were very pleased with the look and quality of the casket.
customer_reviews.author: rach

customer_reviews.title: High Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend! Just as beautiful as any the funeral offered to sell us and for much less money. It was delivered as promised. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget C.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This casket was absolutely beautiful and it was exactly what I was looking for and expected for my father. The delivery to the funeral home was made exactly as scheduled. I was able to buy a better quality casket from Amazon and still save money.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It came with a huge dent! Buyer beware! Don’t buy if there isn’t enough time to send back and find a replacement prior to funeral!
customer_reviews.author: PJM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A beautifully crafted casket that looked phenomenal and quite detailed for it's price point
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Mark

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I only saw it for a few minutes before the burial while a pallbearer. It was beautiful and felt sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Don Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: I hope no one needs 1 any time soon but if you do this was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Family was really surprised with the quality & how nice this casket was for the price & where it was purchased from.
customer_reviews.author: MCSGT0341

customer_reviews.title: Value and beauty.
customer_reviews.text: I needed value and a style that suited my mom. I know she would be happy about her "new car" in a great red color.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Grandma likes
customer_reviews.text: Awesome casket! Really nice, cozy to sleep in and no complaints from grandma yet!!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya and Brad Wall

customer_reviews.title: GRANDMA FELL OUT
customer_reviews.text: All was well until the day of the funeral. As they were lowering grandmas casket, she fell out with champagne in hand. Let’s just say it was an underground party! Grandma and uncle Jimmy were getting it down, though Grandma wasn’t moving or breathing. I’m sure she had blessed time.
customer_reviews.author: Bri Jordan

product_meta.title: Titan Casket - Orion Hunter Green Steel Casket with White Interior
product_meta.description: The Titan Orion Series steel casket is a great combination of style and affordability and a perfect choice to honor your loved one. Meticulously prepared in a high-gloss finish, this casket will be sure to impress with its sculpted, detailed hardware, squared-corner design, reinforced stationary handles, and ‘soft to the touch' white crepe interior. Available in a variety of different color options. Interior dimensions: 79"L x 24"W x 14"H. Exterior dimensions: 83"L x 28"W x 23"H.
feature_bullets: All Titan Casket funeral caskets ship FREE directly to the funeral home of your choice
Full rubber gasketed casket, built from high quality 20 gauge steel
Beautifully made casket for men or women with White Crepe interior and adjustable bed (both head and foot)
Classic squared-corner design with reinforced stationary handles
Made in the USA, hand-crafted design with sculpted, detailed hardware; Fits in standard burial vault

specifications.Item model number: The Orion Green 20 gauge steel casket
